nodes.title: Note: about size
widgets_values:
Due to the **WanAnimateToVideo** node input limit. The width and height must be multiples of 16.

By default, we set it to a smaller size. This is in case you don't have enough VRAM and input a large size, which may cause an out-of-memory issue.

The Image Scale node is to prevent you from inputting an oversized video. A large size video will take a very long time to preprocess.

Please update this setting according to the video size you input

nodes.title: Note: Switch to Move mode
widgets_values:
The model has two modes:
- Mix: character replace
- Move: Pose transfer

If you want to switch to **Move** mode, please disconnect **Background_video** and **Character_mask** output from the **WanAnimateToVideo** node.

Bypass will still pass the input video to the **WanAnimateToVideo** node, so please disconnect them.

nodes.title: Note: Extend video length
widgets_values:
In order to extend the video length, you need to copy and paste multiple times, and then chain the output with the **batch images** node.
Link the **video_frame_offset** to next **WanAnimateToVideo** node

nodes.title: Note: About Points Editor
widgets_values:
## How to load image 

You can right-click on the canvas, then choose Load Image. Or you can run the workflow once, and it will automatically get the first frame of the input video.

## Add new green points

Green points are used to mark the area that you want to detect.
Press the Shift key, then use the left click to add new green points.

## Add new red points

Red points are used to mark the area you want to exclude.
Press the Shift key, then use the right click to add new red points.

## Clear all points

Click the **New canvas** to clear all points

```
    vae/
        wan_2.1_vae.safetensors
```

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (2nd Extension Positive Prompt)
widgets_values:
1960s classic Hammer horror movie. Dramatic shot with intense shadows. Wide angle shot. Full body shot. 
Beautiful vampire woman Joan with long black hair with bangs expressively (dances:1.2) seductively and erotically in a graveyard at night as (an eerie drifting mist continues to drift across the scene:1.5), (She moves towards the camera and looks seductively directly at the viewer while dancing.:1.5). She wears a black gothic vampire dress with a sweetheart neckline, (sheer black pantyhose:1.3) and black high heeled closed lace-up ankle boots. She accessorizes with a necklace, earrings and bracelets. She wears thick black eyeliner, heavy mascara on her long eyelashes, and dark red lipstick.
The (ancient neglected and heavily overgrown:1.3) graveyard is (enveloped by an eerie drifting mist that continues to drift across the scene:1.5). The plain (broken and damaged aging medieval gravestones are weathered and partially covered in moss:1.3). The ground is overgrown with weeds. There is an old twisted and gnarled tree, and some wild red roses are in bloom.
The atmosphere is creepy and scary and typical for a vintage vampire movie. 1960s film aesthetic, film grain, blur.

you can choose a still frame from the original video to act as a reference. you can also bypass this block which may give more variation.

nodes.title: Note: About Custom nodes
widgets_values:
In this template, we have used custom nodes. For users who don't know how to install a custom node, please refer to [How to install custom node](https://docs.comfy.org/installation/install_custom_node).

## Custom nodes

- [comfyui_controlnet_aux](https://github.com/Fannovel16/comfyui_controlnet_aux)
- [ComfyUI-KJNodes](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-KJNodes/)
- [ComfyUI-segment-anything-2](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-segment-anything-2)

This is just a tweaked version of the standard native comfy workflow. I bypassed bits that I'm not using, but left them there to enable further tweaking and messing about.

There are three ImageFlip nodes that are bypassed. They can be ignored, but may be useful if the workflow reverses the direction of background motion (drifting fog in my case).

I use the Q8 quant from:

https://huggingface.co/QuantStack/Wan2.2-Animate-14B-GGUF

and I use character loras.
